fields.name: Profile Pic
fields.value: Me (white lady with white hair) grinning idiotically as I stand beside a very tired-looking Kamala Harris (she was visiting campaign field offices across the nation to thank her staff & volunteers after she dropped out of the race for president)

fields.name: Banner Pic
fields.value: Photo of a small round brass utility cover (like a manhole cover, but about 6 inches across) in the sidewalk labeled WATER. There is a tiny sprout of a tree forcing its way up between the brass cover and the pavement. It's late in the day, the light is go

fields.name: Life View
fields.value: Harm to a group that you're not part of will ultimately harm you too. None of us are free till all of us are free.
